TopicTitle: Exploration Gateway Platform - Lunar L2 Space Station

Articles.Content:
I have created the Exploration Gateway Platform in KSP! The EGP may be a refueling outpost station built on the ISS then shipped out to the Lunar L2. The components are supposed to be launched by NASA's SLS (Space Launch System) and is going to be a Lunar science lab (with landers) and a refueling outpost (gateway) for future manned missions to Near Earth Asteroids and Mars. Read more here -> Exploration Gateway Platform

Mods - KW Rocketry - Lion Aerospace Inc. Circular Solar Panels - SDHI Service Module System - Part Clipping

Updated Orion MPCV
That Orion could use somme work, but the station looks really nice!

The new Orion doesn't use circular panels anymore, so maybe you should change your Orion to reflect that. Also, the SDHI service module provides stockalike Orion modules, so maybe you should consider using that.

Thanks I will check it out! I was trying to mimic the photo. But i understand that the Orion is not the best.

EDIT: Updated with SDHI Service Module System! Thanks Razorcane
